## DateTimeValueObject interface

Represents object that holds data for indentification of validity of date time

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DateTimeValueObject<TDate = any> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [maxValue](./datetime.datetimevalueobject.maxvalue.md) | TDate \| null | Maximal possible value, that can be |
|  [minValue](./datetime.datetimevalueobject.minvalue.md) | TDate \| null | Minimal possible value, that can be |
|  [valid](./datetime.datetimevalueobject.valid.md) | boolean | Indicaiton whether is current value valid, empty value is valid |
|  [value](./datetime.datetimevalueobject.value.md) | [DateTimeValue](./datetime.datetimevalue.md)<!-- -->&lt;TDate&gt; \| null | Current value of datetime |
